job.title: Data Modeler
job.description: pstrongDescriptionstrongppbrppbrppThe EBDM Model Developer Analyst will function as part of the EBDM Model Development team The role will primarily facilitate ongoing model validation efforts including but not limited to writing and executing model code training testing and validation of model performance against benchmark methods data quality assessment implementation of data preprocessing methods reproducible workflow design and documentation of methods assumptions and outcomes Analytical focus will provide insights into business processes derived from model applications and involve communication of technical procedures to a wide audience with varying backgroundsppbrppbrppRequired Job Skillspp Proficiency in Python programming and object oriented designpp Practical experience with large data analysis with multiple open source programming libraries pandas numpy scikitlearn scipy statsmodels as well as one of tensorflowkeraspytorchpp Hadoop Apache Sparkpp Neo4j and Cypherpp General statistics and probabilitypp Time series analysis forecasting and anomaly detectionpp Graph analytics network sciencepp Hands on advanced statistical modeling andor machine learning model development in Pythonpp Experience with model design implementation and evaluation of model performancepp Model validation procedures with knowledge of regulatory requirements in industrypp Quick learner with capacity for independent judgment and decision makingpp Advanced ExcelppbrppDesired Job Skillsppbrpp Effective written and oral communication skills especially in reference to explaining quantitative methodology for audiences of all technical backgroundspp Degree in quantitative discipline involving computer science engineering or statisticspp JiraAgilepp PowerPointpulli SharePointliul
